Title: Visit Name
Description: Visit name: M - in months, SC - screening visit, LOG - records without visit; #2 or #3 define repated records at the same visit or repeated visit

Title: Visit Month
Description: Numeric visit in months; for visits prior baseline -1, -2 is an order of screening visits

Title: Presenting symptom
UniqueValues: Cognitive symptoms; Motor symptoms; Both cognitive and motor symptoms; Psychiatric (depression/anxiety/psychosis); NA

Title: REM-sleep behavior disorder
Description: REM-sleep behavior disorder (per history or polysomnogram)

Title: Severe dysautonomia
Description: Severe dysautonomia (e.g. constipation requiring medications, urinary incontinence, orthostatic hypotension, anhidrosis)

Title: SPECT or PET perfusion scan
Description: SPECT or PET perfusion scan showing occipital hypometabolism

Title: Executive dysfunction
Description: Executive dysfunction, such as bradyphrenia, set shifting impairment, impaired attention/planning

Title: Other genetic data
Description: Other genetic data available on patient
